name: Name
personalityPointsViolated: At most {MAX} points for personalities allowed (currently: {CURRENT}).
animalPointsViolated: At most {MAX} points for animals allowed (currently: {CURRENT}).
specialRuleMismatch: {UNIT} must not have "{A}" and "{B}" at the same time.
swarmCountViolated: A swarm must be represented of at least two units/bases.
incompatibleUnitsViolated: A warband cannot have both "{A}" and "{B}" models at the same time.
rabbleSpecialruleViolated: {UNIT} must not have a quality better than 4+ due to the "{RABBLE}" special rule.
